dublinCore.dc:title: 113 S1060 IS: Veterans to Paramedics Transition Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Ms. Klobuchar (for herself and Mr. Enzi) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

form.official-title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to facilitate emergency medical services personnel training and certification curriculums for military veterans.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Veterans to Paramedics Transition Act .

section.header: Grants for Emergency Medical Services Personnel Training for Veterans
section.text: Section 330J(c) of the Public Health Service Act ( 42 U.S.C. 254c–15(c) ) is amended—

paragraph.text: in paragraph (7), by striking and at the end;
in paragraph (8), by striking the period and inserting ; and; and
by adding at the end the following:

provide to military veterans required coursework and training that take into account, and are not duplicative of, previous medical coursework and training received when such veterans were active members of the Armed Forces, to enable such veterans to satisfy emergency medical services personnel certification requirements, as determined by the appropriate State regulatory entity.
